messages.title: Vote for Dr Ellie Chowns
messages.content: Ellie champions public services. She has spent 20 years working for charities and in education. Ellie is local and she listens. She has raised her family here and understands Herefordshire concerns. Ellie stands up for what matters. She will fight for a fairer, greener future for our children, where everyone's voice is heard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focused on boosting the local economy.
Seeks to hold the government accountable.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The natural alternative to the Conservatives in North Herefordshire

leaflet.personalStatement: Ellie champions public services. She has spent 20 years working for charities and in education. Ellie is local and she listens.

contactInformation.address: The Green Party c/o The Folley, Luston, Leominster HR6 0BX.

images.caption: Vote Ellie Chowns - The natural alternative to the Conservatives in North Herefordshire
